item.title: So, Who’s Getting Fired for This?
item.description: Accidentally texting war plans to a journalist is clear cause for dismissal.

item.title: Hey, Congress, How About Giving the President a Little Help on Tren de Aragua Deportations?
item.description: Trump is out on this limb because the legislative branch is AWOL.

item.title: Trump’s Ultimatum to Columbia University Was Deserved
item.description: Ensuring that the country’s campuses protect the rights of all their students is of vital importance.

item.title: The World Health Organization Is Covering for Hamas
item.description: The agency has consistently concealed Hamas’s abuses and misrepresented Israel’s counterterrorism efforts.

item.title: The End of My Planned Parenthood
item.description: The closure of an abortion clinic comes as good, long-prayed-for news, and it is reality now.
